c:simple-property.name: serverRoot
c:simple-property.description: the absolute path of the Apache server root directory

c:simple-property.name: executablePath
c:simple-property.description: the path to the Apache executable - if the path is not absolute, it will be resolved relative to the server root directory; if unset, default value is 'bin/httpd' on UNIX or 'bin\Apache.exe' on Windows

c:simple-property.name: controlScriptPath
c:simple-property.description: the path to the Apache control script - if the path is not absolute, it will be resolved relative to the server root directory; if unset, default will be 'bin/apachectl' on UNIX or the Apache executable on Windows

c:simple-property.name: url
c:simple-property.description: the http or https URL that will be used to check availability for this Apache server; if not set, availablity will be determined based on whether plugin can connect to the Apache server's SNMP agent

c:simple-property.name: snmpAgentHost
c:simple-property.description: the host name or IP address of the Apache SNMP agent (typically '127.0.0.1')

c:simple-property.name: snmpAgentPort
c:simple-property.description: the TCP port of the Apache SNMP agent (typically '1610')

c:simple-property.name: snmpAgentCommunity
c:simple-property.description: the SNMP community of the Apache SNMP agent (typically 'public')

c:simple-property.name: errorLogFilePath
c:simple-property.description: The absolute path to the error log file - if the path is not absolute, it will be resolved relative to the server root directory; if unset, default will be 'logs/error_log' on UNIX or 'logs\error.log' on Windows.

c:simple-property.name: errorLogEventsEnabled
c:simple-property.description: A flag indicating whether of not generation of Events for new error log entries is enabled.

c:simple-property.name: errorLogMinimumSeverity
c:simple-property.description: The minimum severity of error log entry Events that should be collected. If not specified, there is no minimum severity (i.e. all events will be collected).

c:simple-property.name: errorLogIncludesPattern
c:simple-property.description: A regular expression against which an error log entry's detail is matched to determine if an Event should be fired for that entry. If not specified, no filtering of log entries will be done based on their detail.

operation.name: start
operation.description: Starts this Apache server, or returns an error if it is already running. The control script used is specified in the Connection Properties.

c:simple-property.name: exitCode
c:simple-property.description: the control script's exit code (0 indicates success, any other value indicates failure)

c:simple-property.name: output
c:simple-property.description: the control script's output (stdout and stderr interleaved)

operation.name: stop
operation.description: Stops this Apache server, or returns an error if it is not running. The control script used is specified in the Connection Properties.

c:simple-property.name: exitCode
c:simple-property.description: the control script's exit code (0 indicates success, any other value indicates failure)

c:simple-property.name: output
c:simple-property.description: the control script's output (stdout and stderr interleaved)

operation.name: restart
operation.description: Restarts the Apache server by sending its process a SIGHUP. If the server is not running, it is started. This command automatically checks the server's configuration files via configtest before initiating the restart to make sure Apache doesn't die. The control script used is specified in the Connection Properties. Only supported on UNIX platforms.

c:simple-property.name: exitCode
c:simple-property.description: the control script's exit code (0 indicates success, any other value indicates failure)

c:simple-property.name: output
c:simple-property.description: the control script's output (stdout and stderr interleaved)

operation.name: start_ssl
operation.description: Starts this Apache server with support for SSL. The control script used is specified in the Connection Properties. Only supported on Apache 1.3.

c:simple-property.name: exitCode
c:simple-property.description: the control script's exit code (0 indicates success, any other value indicates failure)

c:simple-property.name: output
c:simple-property.description: the control script's output (stdout and stderr interleaved)

operation.name: graceful_restart
operation.description: Gracefully restarts the Apache server by sending it a SIGUSR1. If the daemon is not running, it is started. This differs from a normal restart in that currently open connections are not aborted. A side effect is that old log files will not be closed immediately. This means that if used in a log rotation script, a substantial delay may be necessary to ensure that the old log files are closed before processing them. This command automatically checks the configuration files via configtest before initiating the restart to make sure Apache doesn't die. The control script used is specified in the Connection Properties.

c:simple-property.name: exitCode
c:simple-property.description: the control script's exit code (0 indicates success, any other value indicates failure)

c:simple-property.name: output
c:simple-property.description: the control script's output (stdout and stderr interleaved)

operation.name: config_test
operation.description: Run a configuration file syntax test. It parses the configuration files and either reports Syntax Ok or detailed information about the particular syntax error. The control script used is specified in the Connection Properties. Only supported on UNIX platforms.

c:simple-property.name: exitCode
c:simple-property.description: the control script's exit code (0 indicates success, any other value indicates failure)

c:simple-property.name: output
c:simple-property.description: the control script's output (stdout and stderr interleaved)

the date and time this Apache server was last started

event.name: errorLogEntry
event.description: an entry in the error log file

c:simple-property.name: url
c:simple-property.description: the http or https URL that will be used to check availability for this virtual host

c:simple-property.name: snmpWwwServiceIndex
c:simple-property.description: the row index for this virtual host in the MIB table of WWW services (i.e. virtual hosts)

c:simple-property.name: responseTimeLogFile
c:simple-property.description: the full path to the log file containing response-time stats for this virtual host

c:simple-property.name: responseTimeUrlExcludes
c:simple-property.description: a space-delimited list of regular expressions specifying URLs that should be excluded from response-time stats collection

c:simple-property.name: responseTimeUrlTransforms
c:simple-property.description: a space-delimited list of Perl-style substitution expressions that should be applied to all URLs for which response-time stats are collected (e.g. |^/dept/finance/.*|/dept/finance/*|)
